subject: Ship time eta
description_text:
Just wondering to check stock level and fulfilment time on the simsonn hs pro shifter?

Thanks Kyle

conversations.body_text: Hi kyle brocklebank,  Due to a few days off during the New Year holiday, emails were accumulated, which caused a delay in our response. We sincerely apologize for this. We are currently working overtime to produce the HS Pro, and we will arrange shipment for you as soon as possible.Â
